data.message: Hey Facebook can you please fix the news feed to go in chronological order.

replies.message: Hi Erin. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2nhSeBd. -Jessica
Hi Jessica I want to see posts from the day not posts that were 24 hrs ago.
Click on the right side upper corner and select most recent. That should help.
Why do we have to do it every time we open it. If we change to most recent it should stay as our default.
It should stay what you put it at, not flip back to the other setting.
"Most recent" is no longer an option. Why?
If there is no "Most Recent" option Facebook is behind the times. It's like reading yesterday's newspaper or watching reruns, no need to comment or like, it's over and people have moved on...
I see the most recent tab on my updated FB. Which screen are you looking at?
